derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Greek, literally as an ox turns in ploughing', from bous 'ox' + -strophos 'turning'

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient writing system: having alternate lines written in opposite directions; literally `as the ox ploughs'
